channel.title: Posts on skuzzymiglet's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on skuzzymiglet's blog

item.title: 5 tips
item.description: Just 5 general tips for programming (and other things) Do it now If you want to do something, just do it. Don’t get used to a bug or error. Don’t adjust to multiple keypresses. Look it up on GitHub, Stackoverflow or just Google it. It’s rewarding fixing things I struggle to adhere to this sometimes. But it’s a rule that pays off Use it If you make somthing, you should find a use for it yourself.

item.title: Hello
item.description: Hello there! This is the first blog post here, just to combat that 404 page! I’ll try to post every week from now on
